lessons.title: Simple word problem
lessons.content: Mia had 12 apples. She gave 4 to her friend. How many left?

lessons.title: Intro to fractions
lessons.content: 1/2 of a pizza is eaten. What fraction remains?

lessons.title: More word problems
lessons.content: Tom has 20 candies. He eats 5 and gives 3 to his sister. How many left?

lessons.title: Fractions in real life
lessons.content: If a cake is cut into 4 equal pieces and 1 piece is eaten, what fraction remains?

lessons.title: Combining word problems and fractions
lessons.content: Sarah has 10 oranges. She eats 2 and gives 1/2 of the rest to her friend. How many left?

lessons.title: Understanding halves and quarters
lessons.content: If a chocolate bar is divided into 4 equal pieces and you eat 1 piece, what fraction is left?
